DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Compare ratio post- pre-treatment plasma transform growth factor-beta 1 ( TGF-β ) woman invasive breast cancer undergo hypofractionated radiotherapy vs standard-fractionated external-beam radiotherapy . Secondary - Establish longitudinal serum plasma biorepository retrospective evaluation TGF-β biomarkers special relevance radiation response . - Correlate pre-treatment plasma TGF-β level clinical fibrosis development . OUTLINE : This randomize study . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I ( hypofractionated radiotherapy ) : Patients undergo external-beam radiotherapy daily 5 day week 3.5 week ( 16 fraction total ) . - Arm II ( standard fractionate radiotherapy ) : Patients undergo radiotherapy arm I low dose 5 week ( 25 fraction total ) . After completion study treatment , patient follow every 6 month 2 year annually 3 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 100 patient accrue study .
